effect.sword-shield: Switches the target out for another of its trainer’s Pokémon selected at random. Wild battles end immediately. Doesn’t affect Pokémon with suction cups or under the effect of ingrain.
effect.the-isle-of-armor: Switches the target out for another of its trainer’s Pokémon selected at random. Wild battles end immediately. Doesn’t affect Pokémon with suction cups or under the effect of ingrain.
effect.the-crown-tundra: Switches the target out for another of its trainer’s Pokémon selected at random. Wild battles end immediately. Doesn’t affect Pokémon with suction cups or under the effect of ingrain.
effect.brilliant-diamond-and-shining-pearl: Switches the target out for another of its trainer’s Pokémon selected at random. Wild battles end immediately. Doesn’t affect Pokémon with suction cups or under the effect of ingrain.
effect.legends-arceus: Switches the target out for another of its trainer’s Pokémon selected at random. Wild battles end immediately. Doesn’t affect Pokémon with suction cups or under the effect of ingrain.

short_effect.sword-shield: Immediately ends wild battles. Forces trainers to switch Pokémon.
short_effect.the-isle-of-armor: Immediately ends wild battles. Forces trainers to switch Pokémon.
short_effect.the-crown-tundra: Immediately ends wild battles. Forces trainers to switch Pokémon.
short_effect.brilliant-diamond-and-shining-pearl: Immediately ends wild battles. Forces trainers to switch Pokémon.
short_effect.legends-arceus: Immediately ends wild battles. Forces trainers to switch Pokémon.

flavor_text.sword-shield: The target is scared off, and a different Pokémon is dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a single Pokémon.
flavor_text.legends-arceus: The target is scared off, and a different Pokémon is dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a single Pokémon.
